alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River; Yukon Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 4:18AM AKST until December 13 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits, Yukon Flats and White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Dalton Highway Summits; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River; Yukon Flats
